html:
9.30.18  9:54 pm   music in general is so complicated to me and it makes me so sad because i want to be able to do cool stuff with music but i know it'll stress me out if i try to learn how to do music stuff

     it's not stressful to learn how it works but it can be stressful to learn how it doesn't work

9.30.18  9:43 pm   i really wish i were good at singing. how do i get better at it? are there any specific things i should do besides. doing it a bunch ?? cuz i know nothing about singing how to Good????? wenjnwafsdgsf

     keep doing it but be careful and gentle. have some simple repeating things that you hum gently to yourself throughout the day

9.30.18  9:00 pm   If the music video playlist is chronological, then why do you drop newxvideosxinbtte middle of the first (good/newer/not-angsty-teen/beyond-growing-pains) half?

     i actually don't know where they land in the list. i just check the box of the lists i want to add the video to when i upload them

9.30.18  8:55 pm   Whenever I first make a song in a particular genre, I really like it, but each time after that, I seem to lose grasp on what made the first one good. Do you have any tips on keeping that consistent quality?

     just keep changing it a little with each song

9.30.18  8:31 pm   Do you like to type on a computer?

     yes, if it has pressable buttons

9.30.18  8:29 pm   i'm listening to bohemian rhapsody and i'm just sitting here like how the hell did a six minute prog rock song gain the love and attention of millions for multiple decades? like it breaks all the "rules" of how to be a popular song but does it anyway. that's amazing and i can only dream of pulling some shit like that

     sounds like you are hot on the course toward doing it

9.30.18  7:31 pm   would you ever do something avant garde and infernal sounding with positive lyrical themes?

     sure, although i feel like i have done it before

9.30.18  6:33 pm   I got in trouble for stealing wet floor signs from school. The administration says I should give them back. What should I do?

     you must learn to get more enjoyment out of them, while you are in school

9.30.18  6:20 pm   What are some things I could do/read to understand the "time space continuum" closer to the way you understand it?

     start going places at times. i think you'll start to get the hang of it

9.30.18  5:20 pm   if we let the pirates make the music, where does that leave us?

     anyone can listen to, or make music. pirates, non-pirates, ex-pirates, semi-pirates, etc

9.30.18  3:55 pm   Can cats predict future?

     no but they can influence it

9.30.18  3:52 pm   What kind of music do you prefer?

     mix the kinds if possible. make a stew

9.30.18  3:51 pm   Your opinion on Europeans?

     you can never quite guess who is european and who is not

9.30.18  3:29 pm   can you make a song with math?

      i've used math in songs before but i am going to use it again

9.30.18  3:20 pm   whats your favorite song by yourself

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

9.30.18  3:19 pm   What is your opnion about potatoes being gods/godness?

     that's true but everything else also is

9.30.18  3:01 pm   everything can and does evoke a feeling. is everything feelings? 

     yes

9.30.18  2:17 pm   Do you enjoy a good game of tic-tac-toe?

     i was going to say no but on re-consideration i can't deny

9.30.18  2:11 pm   did ypu realized your hiatus is shorter?

     i don't do hiatus

9.30.18  2:04 pm   is the second word of the new song title "moon"

     yes

9.30.18  1:24 pm   ok so bill, i have a good idea of what i'm doing with my life and how i'm gonna get there, but it's so long term and i'm struggle with the intermediary steps, well not really struggling, i definitely know I can do it if I just put myself to it, but thing is I never feel like putting myself to it despite making to-do lists and such, because I feel trapped that I have to spend all these years working towards that one big goal and I feel like I have no time for the things I actually want to do on the side, yet when I get home I'm lazy and I don't do anything and I waste a phenomenal amount of time not being able to decide whether I want to do something for my present self or my future self, so I end up wasting the entire day away somehow doing neither and it makes me depressed. How do I solve this?

     it sounds like you need to be more specific in the details, especially the time table. also need to get clear about if you really want to do this, and why. also you may just have to wait a few more years until you get a little more desperate to accomplish it. although if you think you are desperate enough to do it now, then you can go ahead and get started

9.30.18  11:40 am   Hi. Need a quick question answered. Is the world sentient and meaningful

     you are

      or is it just a random chain of events, and we're assigning it the meaning ourselves?

     i would give it a little more credit than that

9.30.18  11:00 am   why do you start all this art?

     in order to potentially finish it

9.30.18  10:43 am   ever consider making merch?

     possibly

9.30.18  10:06 am   lizards vs. sea turtles

     oh i'm excited but you didn't tell me where and when

9.30.18  9:13 am   today's sunday hmmm each day has sun  .... and we don't name the nights .... why do we even need the names, we can be faster and just use dates!

     a 7 day cycle is nice, and useful

9.30.18  9:12 am   Hi! What's the nicest thing you've seen recently?

     a planet

9.30.18  8:49 am   please do more asethic things like this. thank you.

     i am cooking some up right now

9.30.18  8:21 am   how 2 gett part time job??

     get a full time job and then quit half way through the day each day and then come back the next day and pretend it didn't happen

9.30.18  8:19 am   what was the question damien maymdien skipped in the blades of grass video

     the pineapple pizza question

9.30.18  6:50 am   What do you really hate?

     nothing but i mildly dislike being encouraged to hate stuff. hate baiting, i call it

9.30.18  6:02 am   why is it when i keep vegetables in the ground they dont go bad but the second i pull them out i need to refrigerate them?

     because you killed them

      also why do they call it refrigerating if this is the first time im frigeing

     that is from the bible. in the old testament the world was cold. so when we refrigerate we are harkening back to that time

9.30.18  5:15 am   Do you like to occasionally hit that nasty yeet?

     i got that self hitting yeet

9.30.18  4:50 am   what do we get as the viewers if we correctly guess a new song title?

     a cool smock but i have to make sure no one guesses it because i don't have any more smocks, too many people got it last time

9.30.18  4:01 am   Any thoughts on Shepard tones?

     could be just the ticket for that infinite staircase

      I want to use them in songs for things as like a keyboard patch for phrases that keep going in (mostly) one direction. But it's hard to figure out how to do it? All the stuff I find is about continuous glissandos, which is cool and all, but not what I'm looking for...

     you could just record what you need, and then double it in octaves and fade the volume as needed. would take a little bit of busy work, but it will get the job done

9.30.18  1:48 am   what are meters? I can't tell after listening to your songs

     could be like a way to measure something

9.29.18  11:38 pm   were you a fan of craig ferguson's late late show when it was on the air?

     no but i got into it after. actually just the interviews, never seen the rest. i particularly like the ritual of ripping up the note cards at the beginning, it's a nice touch and a very meaningful gesture

9.29.18  10:53 pm   what type of magic do you use?

     i reach into the bag blindfolded each time

9.29.18  9:49 pm   Have a favourite album?

     i prefer to let the songs roam free

9.29.18  8:43 pm   are you the government ?

     yes, and so can you

9.29.18  8:36 pm   How do you determine the order of the music videos playlist: my favorite drinking playlist next to my AUTISMAL playlist?

     i don't remember but i probably intended it to be in chronological order

9.29.18  8:33 pm   What are the first, second, third, and/or fourth words of the new song title

     the

9.29.18  8:18 pm   are you okay as an artist with people interpreting your creations wildly differently than maybe how you intended them? or do you intend them to be any way at all? like, if i pull some deep philosophical politcal meaning out of "alphabet shuffle" and tell people about it, is that something you have an opinion on? or do you think it is whatever unless someone tries to say it is what YOU intended? just curious about how you deal with that stuff

     the most important part for me to do is make the song, the way it looks and sounds. that's really what it's all about, and it is a full-time (actually over-time) job. if there is any discussion about it after it is released, i would usually be busy making the next one and therefore not be able to weigh in

9.29.18  7:04 pm   30th word of the lyrics (if any) of the next video or song

     (a)round

9.29.18  6:59 pm   one thing I noticed about your songs is that the bass is very audible, so why did you choose to do that, being that most pop releases of the past 4 decades have the bass kinda buried in the mix?

     i disagree with that last part

9.29.18  6:40 pm   Chemical compounds are variables in the equation of existence but why and how does c o n s c i o u s n e s s factor in??

     it's the signs and operators

9.29.18  5:20 pm   how long did it take you to completely finish Soap Tips?

     12 days

9.29.18  5:13 pm   What is your definition of love?

     it seems strongest when it evades definitions

9.29.18  4:36 pm   I'm trying to figure out what path I should take in life. All I know for sure is that i want to create. I'm intrigued by the idea of YouTube as a hobby, or commissioning art, or directing films, but i don't want to be "aquatinted with all; master of none" if that makes sense. How do I go about this?

     what is within reach? start there and that will give you more clues

9.29.18  2:55 pm    what is the flavor and mouth feel of the new song? 

     frisky bossa samba with key changes almost too risky for the workplace
